title: Wall Street Breakfast July 13: Bank Earnings On The Radar
author: Seeking Alpha

description: In today’s top stories: Bank earnings on the radar; President Trump meets with May after threatening to kill trade deal over soft Brexit; and the Justice Department appeals decision to allow AT&T/Time Warner merger. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
